1.3.1 / 2015-09-23
==================

 * test: use codecov.io instead of coveralls

1.3.0 / 2015-03-02
==================

 * improve tests and coverage
 * add checkFile hook to do file check, like limit filenam extension
 * add checkField hook to do prepare jobs, like csrf
